special-achievements: Title for the Special Page that lists all achievements.
achievementbadges-anon-text: Shown on [[Special:Achievements]] when user tries to access their achievements before logging in
special-achievements-header-not-earning-: Label for the achieved achievements sub-section.
achievements-summary: Explanatory text shown at the top of [[Special:Achievements]].
achievementbadges-beta-feature-achieveme:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as description for the checkbox to enable the achievement system.

The label for this checkbox is {{msg-mw|achievementbadges-beta-feature-achievement-enable-message}}.
achievementbadges-disabled: Used as error message in [[Special:Achievements]] when the feature is disabled by the user.
log-name-achievementbadges:
{{doc-logpage}}

The name of the achievement log. Used as heading on [[Special:Log/create]] and in the drop down menu for selecting logs on [[Special:Log]].
notification-header-achievementbadges-ea:
Header text for a notification when you are earned an achievement.
* $1 - user's name (not suitable for GENDER).
* $2 - user's name for use in GENDER.
* $3 - the name of obtain achievement
